data: IR Gastrostomy / Gastrojejunostomy Tube Insertion Post Procedure (Module)
Admit/Transfer/Discharge
Nurse to Discontinue Order Set/Phase
Discontinue IR Gastrostomy / Gastrojejunostomy Tube Insertion Pre Procedure (Module)
Patient Care
If there is a risk of catheter dislodgement by patient consider the use of the Restraints Adult (Module)
Remove Nasogastric (NG) Tube
T+1;N, 24 hours post-procedure if no peritoneal issues
T+1;0800, Post-procedure day 1 if no peritoneal issues
Provider to enter Requested Start Date/Time Field
Remove Orogastric (OG) Tube
T+1;N, 24 hours post-procedure if no peritoneal issues
T+1;0800, Post-procedure day 1 if no peritoneal issues
Provider to enter Requested Start Date/Time Field
Irrigate Gastrostomy Tube
24 hours post-procedure
20 mL warm water q12h, and before and after medications
30 mL warm water q4h, and before and after medications
Irrigate Gastrojejunostomy Tube
24 hours post-procedure
20 mL warm water q12h, and before and after medications
30 mL warm water q4h, and before and after medications
May use Enteral Tube
If no peritoneal issues including, but not limited to: abdominal pain, tenderness, guarding
Communication Order
After 4 weeks check balloon volume qmonthly
Remove Sutures
T+10;0800, 10 days post-procedure. Cut suture as close as possible to the skin entry site
T+14;0800, 14 days post-procedure. Cut suture as close as possible to the skin entry site
Wound Care
Site: Gastrostomy or Gastrojejunostomy, Change outer gauze dressing to incision site 24 hours post-procedure, then daily and PRN
Site: Gastrostomy or Gastrojejunostomy, Remove dressing Post Procedure if no lekage. Provider to enter Requested Start Date/Time Field
Wound Care
Site: Gastrostomy or Gastrojejunostomy, Do not remove button sutures.  They will fall off on their own in 7 to 10 days
Diagnostic Tests
IR Tube Change Gastrostomy
Timed, Special Instructions: Tube change required 3 months post-procedure, Order for future visit
Timed, Special Instructions: Tube change required 6 months post-procedure, Order for future visit
Timed, Special Instructions: Tube change required 12 months post-procedure, Order for future visit
IR Tube Change Gastrojejunostomy
Timed, Special Instructions: Tube change required 3 months post-procedure, Order for future visit
Timed, Special Instructions: Tube change required 6 months post-procedure, Order for future visit
Timed, Special Instructions: Tube change required 12 months post-procedure, Order for future visit
Consults/Referrals
Dietitian Adult Consult
Reason for Consult: Enteral Nutrition, Tube feeding recommendations as per dietitian
Pharmacy Consult
Reason for Consult: Change Medication Route/Form per Details.
None
